messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Today is National 'Hunt a Wabbit' Day.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We have developed a prototype machirne and put it in your chemistry lab, dorms, and crew breakroom

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
misuse of this gift will result with them being teleported back
]

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: due to misuse of these devices, we have teleported them back

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
General Alert

What the fuck was that?!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on scans from our long-range sensors, we believe that all of the station's lesser lifeforms has developed command level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Spacepizza Division

Cargo: It looks like a neighbouring station accidentally delivered their pizza to you instead

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Easter Port Mu's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Escape Pod Two.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on energy emissions we detected, we believe that one of the station's simple animals has developed security level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.
